mapper.select: SELECT h.*,su.user_name AS USE_NAME FROM hqm_pfmea_detail h , sys_user su where h.charge_id =su.user_id(+)

SELECT h.*,su.user_name AS USE_NAME FROM hqm_pfmea_detail h , sys_user su where h.charge_id =su.user_id(+) AND h.parent_branch_id IS NULL
and h.branch_name like concat('%',concat(#{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and h.fmea_id = #{fmeaId}
and 1=2
SELECT h.*,su.user_name AS USE_NAME FROM hqm_pfmea_detail h , sys_user su where h.charge_id =su.user_id(+) and h.parent_branch_id =#{parentBranchId}

/*从最下层找上层 */ select rownum ,b.* from ( SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT t.branch_name ,tl.branch_name AS function_name ,tll.branch_name AS structure_name , CASE WHEN t.post_rpn IS NULL THEN t.rpn ELSE t.post_rpn END AS rpn , CASE WHEN t.post_severity IS NULL THEN t.severity ELSE t.post_severity END AS severity , CASE WHEN t.post_occurrence IS NULL THEN t.occurrence ELSE t.post_occurrence END AS occurrence , CASE WHEN t.post_detection IS NULL THEN t.detection ELSE t.post_detection END AS detection FROM hqm_pfmea_detail t, hqm_pfmea_detail tl, hqm_pfmea_detail tll , WHERE t.fmea_id = #{fmeaId} AND t.ranks = 3 AND tl.branch_id = t.parent_branch_id AND tl.parent_branch_id = tll.branch_id) a ORDER BY a.rpn DESC) b

SELECT * FROM(SELECT h.branch_name AS function_name ,h1.branch_name AS structure_name ,h2.branch_name ,h2.failure_consequences ,h2.severity ,h2.special_characteristic_type ,h2.failure_reason ,h2.preventive_measure ,h2.occurrence ,h2.detection_measure ,h2.detection ,h2.rpn ,h2.suggest_measure ,su.user_name as useName ,h2.estimated_finish_time ,h2.measure_result ,h2.post_severity ,h2.post_occurrence ,h2.post_detection ,h2.post_rpn FROM hqm_pfmea_detail h, hqm_pfmea_detail h1, hqm_pfmea_detail h2, sys_user su WHERE h.parent_branch_id IS NULL AND h.branch_id = h1.parent_branch_id AND h1.branch_id = h2.parent_branch_id AND h2.charge_id = su.user_id(+) AND h.fmea_id = #{fmeaId} ) a ORDER BY a.function_name,a.structure_name
SELECT hd.* FROM hqm_pfmea_detail hd WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hqm_invalid hi WHERE hi.invalid_name = hd.branch_name) and hd.fmea_id = #{fmeaId} and hd.ranks = 1

SELECT t.* FROM hqm_pfmea_detail t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.branch_id = #{branchId} UNION ALL SELECT t1.* FROM hqm_pfmea_detail t1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t1.parent_branch_id = #{branchId} UNION ALL SELECT t2.* FROM hqm_pfmea_detail t2, hqm_pfmea_detail t3 WHERE 1 = 1 AND t2.parent_branch_id = t3.branch_id AND t3.parent_branch_id = #{branchId}
SELECT count(*) FROM hqm_pfmea_detail hi WHERE hi.branch_name =#{branchName} and hi.fmea_id = #{fmeaId} and hi.parent_branch_id IS NULL

SELECT hf.kid ,hf.fmea_code ,hf.fmea_name ,hf.fmea_type ,hf.analysis_object ,su.user_name as FMEA_USE_NAME ,hf.current_version ,HF.ANALYSIS_OBJECT ,strcat(su2.user_name) as USE_NAMES ,hf.last_update_date FROM hqm_fmea hf, sys_user su, hqm_fmea_staff hfs, sys_user su2, sys_user su3 WHERE hf.charge_id = su.user_id AND hf.created_by = su3.user_id AND hfs.fmea_id(+) = hf.kid AND hfs.staff_id = su2.user_id(+) and hf.kid= #{kid}
GROUP BY hf.kid ,hf.fmea_code ,hf.fmea_name ,hf.fmea_type ,hf.analysis_object ,su.user_name ,hf.current_version ,su3.user_name ,hf.last_update_date order by hf.LAST_UPDATE_DATE desc
SELECT hi.invalid_id FROM hqm_pfmea_detail hd, hqm_pfmea_detail hd2, hqm_p_invalid hi WHERE hd.branch_id = hd2.parent_branch_id AND hd.branch_name = hi.invalid_name and hd2.branch_id= #{branchId}

SELECT hi.invalid_id FROM hqm_pfmea_detail hd, hqm_pfmea_detail hd2, hqm_pfmea_detail hd3, hqm_p_invalid hi WHERE hd.branch_id = hd2.parent_branch_id and hd3.branch_id=hd.parent_branch_id AND hd3.branch_name = hi.invalid_name and hd2.branch_id= #{branchId}
